recommendations: Punit Saurabh “I have known Subhendu as a hard working , High energy ,highly entrepreneurial with deep knowledge and commitment for the work he takes up. He is a hard motivator and an excellent manager. I see him as the beacon of hope for my fellow countrymen because of his deep devotion and commitment to entrepreneurship and innovation related activities that he pursues and the networking that he shares with the outside world. All the Best Subhendu "”

Dawn Thomas “Perseverance, Dedication and Hard work, Subhendu would be an asset to any organization. With diligence and discipline he completely devotes himself to dispensing his duties as well as the implementation of new ideas.”
